name: `Action Race of Jumpy Hill: Tiny Kids Car Racing Game by Top Crazy Games
name_original: `Action Race of Jumpy Hill: Tiny Kids Car Racing Game by Top Crazy Games
description:
**TOP 200 RACING AND SPORTS GAME**
*** BEWARE: FRUSTRATION IS COMING ***

Who's ready for a new challenge?
Play Jumpy Hill: Tiny Car Run Racing now on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch

How to play:
1. Tap your device to make Goofy Joe's car jump.
2. Watch out for incoming obstacles to increase your score.
3. With Gamecenter support, Beat your friends and see who can get the highest score
4. Reach distances described below to unlock cool upgrades

Turn Goofy Joe into a Policeman by collecting these points:
- Police Cap (5 pts)
- Police Shades (10 pts)
- Police Shadow Moustache (15 pts)
- Police Cop Car (20 pts)

and..... more to come!

Enjoy!
